name: Student Career Panel
blurb: A career-focused roundtable with three Penn students, who've each had internships in banking and/or consulting.  Panel members shared their personal experiences and advice on the job recruitment process.

name: Marissa Paragano & Co.
blurb: A career-focused roundtable with Marissa Paragano, VP of Digital at JPMorgan Chase, and a few of her colleagues.

name: Bruce Hernandez
blurb: A roundtable on private equity with Bruce Hernandez, a founding partner from Spire Capital.
